title: [BUG] dist module artifact contains duplicate LICENCE and NOTICE files in spark3xy/META-INF

labels.name: build
labels.description: Related to CI / CD or cleanly building

body:
**Describe the bug** When shim jars are aggregated into the final parallel world jar, it should retain a single copy of META-INF/LICENSE META-INF/NOTICE Instead we end up with 
$ unzip -l /tmp/rapids-4-spark_2.12-23.04.1.jar '*LICENSE'  '*NOTICE' | wc -l
35

$ unzip -l /tmp/rapids-4-spark_2.12-23.04.1.jar '*LICENSE'  '*NOTICE'
Archive:  /tmp/rapids-4-spark_2.12-23.04.1.jar
  Length      Date    Time    Name
---------  ---------- -----   ----
    11357  2023-05-09 12:25   META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 12:26   META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 12:25   spark311/META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 12:26   spark311/META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 09:21   spark312/META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 09:22   spark312/META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 09:40   spark313/META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 09:41   spark313/META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 09:54   spark320/META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 09:55   spark320/META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 10:09   spark321/META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 10:10   spark321/META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 10:26   spark321cdh/META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 10:27   spark321cdh/META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 10:42   spark322/META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 10:43   spark322/META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 10:57   spark323/META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 10:58   spark323/META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 11:12   spark330/META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 11:13   spark330/META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 11:29   spark331/META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 11:30   spark331/META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 11:48   spark332/META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 11:49   spark332/META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 12:06   spark330cdh/META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 12:07   spark330cdh/META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 05:45   spark321db/META-INF/LICENSE
    39730  2023-05-09 05:46   spark321db/META-INF/NOTICE
    39730  2023-05-09 05:45   spark330db/META-INF/NOTICE
    11357  2023-05-09 05:44   spark330db/META-INF/LICENSE
---------                     -------
   766305                     30 files
and there are only two unique files ``` $ find out/ -type f | xargs md5sum | sort -u -k1,1 86d3f3a95c324c9479bd8986968f4327 out/spark321/META-INF/LICENSE cd6b4cf55f818b2e1f7339fc52a1271e out/spark321/META-INF/NOTICE ``` **Steps/Code to reproduce bug** ```bash ./buidl/buildall ``` locally or download a CI-built jar from a Maven repo **Expected behavior** The dist jar should have only top-level META-INF/LICENCE META-INF/NOTICE files **Environment details (please complete the following information)** any **Additional context** N/A
